text: Miguel Ángel Gallardo Paredes (27 December 1955 – 21 February 2022) was a Spanish comic book artist. He was known for his works in Spanish underground comics scene of the 1970s and 1980s. His best known works were El Víbora, Cairo, Complot and Viñetas and characters such as Makoki. Gallardo died on 21 February 2022 in Barcelona, Spain at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish writers Category:Comics writers Category:People from Lleida
title: Miguel Gallardo
